item.title: Coinbase Secures FDIC Unredacted Files in Operation Chokepoint 2.0 Probe
item.description:
Coinbase has secured unredacted FDIC documents related to its investigation into "Operation Chokepoint 2.0," revealing efforts to restrict cryptocurrency activities by advising banks to pause engagement with crypto businesses during 2022.

item.title: Convict in ‘Undead Apes’ NFT Scheme Takes Life Days Before Sentencing
